subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Simon Gagné scored his second goal of the game 48 seconds into overtime and the Philadelphia Flyers won their fifth straight game, 3-2 over the visiting Carolina Hurricanes last night.
snippet: Simon Gagné scored his second goal of the game 48 seconds into overtime and the Philadelphia Flyers won their fifth straight game, 3-2 over the visiting Carolina Hurricanes last night.
